## How to Apply

### Via GitHub Web UI

1. Go to repository settings: https://github.com/agigante80/vibe-coding-prompts
2. Under "About", click the gear icon ⚙️
3. Add the description above
4. Add topics (paste comma-separated list)
5. Click "Save changes"

### Via GitHub API

```bash
# Update repository description and topics
curl -X PATCH \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/agigante80/vibe-coding-prompts \
  -d '{
    "description": "Curated AI prompts for software development - comprehensive meta-prompts for documentation, CI/CD, testing, security audits, logging, and code quality with vibe coding philosophy",
    "topics": ["ai-prompts", "automation", "chatgpt", "ci-cd", "code-quality", "copilot", "devops", "documentation", "github-actions", "logging", "meta-prompts", "prompt-engineering", "security-audit", "testing", "vibe-coding"]
  }'
```
